name: 林彥良
objective:
提升學生職場與外國人互動時，除了練習英語聽力及口說能力，並融入文化理解、熟悉日常工作中英語核心字彙及句型並加以訓練，讓學生日後得以實際應用在職場之中。
This course is designed to improve students' English speaking skills for the workplace. The content will include essential vocabulary, structure, organization and delivery, common functions, and interactive communication.
